content.rendered: Plantable bags is an environment-friendly paper bag manufacturing company that provides Reusable & Eco-friendly Shopping bags from recycled paper & vegetable seeds. The bags can be planted and grow into plants once they have done served their purpose. I was asked to create a brand identity that expresses the brand values and introduce the relatively new product in a way that resonates with the target market The project included their Logo Design, Stationery items, and client engagement materials.
